title: Top Places to visit in Narasapuram, Andhra Pradesh
content: Narasapuram (or Narsapur) is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and Mandal headquarters of Narasapuram Mandal in Narasapuram revenue division. The town is situated on the banks of the Vasista Godavari River. The lace industry is prevalent

Top Places to visit in Nagari, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Nagari is a town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Nagari Mandal in the Chittoor revenue division.
 
Geography
Nagari is located at 13.33°N 79.58°E. It has an average elevation of 116 meters (380 feet)

title: Top Places to visit in Markapur, Andhra Pradesh
content: Markapuram is a town in Prakasam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. title: Top Places to visit in Mandapeta, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Mandapeta, also called Mandavyapuram is a town and an A-grade municipality in East Godavari district in the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a market place and a place of recreation for many surrounding villages and it is famous for its rice mills.

Top Places to visit in Kovvur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Kovvur is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the Mandal headquarters of Kovvur Mandal in Kovvur revenue division.

title: Top Places to visit in Kavali, Andhra Pradesh
content: Kavali is the second-largest city in the Nellore district of Andhra Pradesh of India. It is one of the major cities in Andhra Pradesh. Top Places to visit in Kanigiri, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Kanigiri is a census town in Prakasam district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of kanigiri Mandal in Kandukur revenue division.

Top Places to visit in Jammalamadugu, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Jammalamadugu is a Municipality and Revenue Division in Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is in Jammalamadugu mandal of Jammalamadugu revenue division.
